name: Twiniwt
description:
Solve the puzzles, and make music meanwhile. Twiniwt is an elegant, genre-defining symmetrical movement puzzle.

Symmetry is both your friend and enemy in this smart, musical puzzle game. Make the blocks reach their targets! Sounds easy, right?

FEATURES:

- ONLY TWO RULES
If you move a block, its twin also moves symmetrically; but if you push the block with another, its twin won't move.

- 300+ HANDCRAFTED LEVELS
With a variety of fun, diverse mechanics introduced as you progress. And even more to come!

- THE MUSIC IS YOU
Control and create the music of levels. Move the blocks, change the notes.

- NO WAIT MECHANISMS
Play whenever you want, as long as you want.

- NON-LINEAR GAMEPLAY
Unlock chapters, pick the level you want to play.

- HIGH REPLAY VALUE
All puzzles have multiple solutions. How you solve is up to you. You can even beat the designer's solution!

- BEAUTIFUL VISUALS
A mix of De Stijl colors and soothing art.
